title: Game Lags after patch
body:
Hey everyone, after the latest patch the game started to stutter/lag a lot, I've  reasonably good ping ~40 and between 110 and 120 fps (capped at 120), the weird thing is that I dont get any spikes in my ping and fps, but the game stutters anyway. 

This started hapening after the latest patch so I feel like it has something to do with it.

replies.body:
If you're seeing crazy stutters and stuff like champs sliding around and minions acting weird, but never see any drops in fps or ping, there's a very good chance this is happening from packet loss.  Do me a favor and run a quick traceroute to the EUW servers at 185.40.65.1 and post the results here so I can take a look.

In the meantime, double check your network settings like port forwarding and DNS settings to ensure you get a solid connection in case packet loss isn't the real problem here.

Screenshot Here: [Screenshot](https://i.gyazo.com/2e5cb7e05b6933abf42219354d6cc69e.png)

Text Here:

Tracing route to 185.40.65.1 over a maximum of 30 hops

  1    <1 ms    <1 ms    <1 ms  NOSDRIVE [192.168.1.1]
  2     9 ms     6 ms     5 ms  10.11.191.254
  3     7 ms    15 ms     6 ms  10.137.218.17
  4    37 ms    36 ms    37 ms  10.255.51.34
  5     *       39 ms    38 ms  riot-games.baja.espanix.net [193.149.1.32]
  6     *        *        *     Request timed out.
  7     *        *        *     Request timed out.
  8     *        *        *     Request timed out.
  9     *        *        *     Request timed out.
 10     *        *        *     Request timed out.
 11     *        *        *     Request timed out.
 12     *        *        *     Request timed out.
 13     *        *        *     Request timed out.
 14     *        *        *     Request timed out.
 15     *        *        *     Request timed out.
 16     *        *        *     Request timed out.
 17     *        *        *     Request timed out.
 18     *        *        *     Request timed out.
 19     *        *        *     Request timed out.
 20     *        *        *     Request timed out.
 21     *        *        *     Request timed out.
 22     *        *        *     Request timed out.
 23     *        *        *     Request timed out.
 24     *        *        *     Request timed out.
 25     *        *        *     Request timed out.
 26     *        *        *     Request timed out.
 27     *        *        *     Request timed out.
 28     *        *        *     Request timed out.
 29     *        *        *     Request timed out.
 30     *        *        *     Request timed out.

Trace complete.

Yea all those timeouts are where your connection is getting stuck. A VPN might be able to help for the time being, but reach out to our techs in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with your network logs so they can see if there is anything specific causing problems or if the main problem lies with your ISP.

Thank you for your help, I'll be creating a ticket.

EDIT: I've tried to create a ticket, but it says theres no support for my region (EUW)

Whaaaaaaa no support for your region o_O? There's definitely support for the EUW still! Try signing out and back in, and if that doesn't work shoot me a screenshot of what you're seeing so I can look into this.

In the meantime if nothing is working, you should be able to submit a ticket through email us at support@riotgames.com

I've logged out and logged back in, it looked like it was a login session bug, since I was signed with my EUW account and was on NA Boards, so I had to logout twice for some reason.

It was showing [this](https://i.gyazo.com/a996bb2da3bf683791dc59ee162017d2.png) and when I selected the question it would ask to log in although I was already signed in.


Anyways, it seems like its working now, if something goes wrong I'll let you know.

Thank you again for the help

Weeeeeeeird, I'm guessing it was due to being logged in on the NA boards at the same time, so it thought you were trying to submit an EUW ticket as NA. Glad you got through ^_^

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
This SAME thing is happening to me. I just repaired client to see if that works. Will update shortly.
